gui.bed_fail.message: Uh oh, what if the oxygen runs out when I am asleep?  I'll need a Cryogenic Chamber to sleep in space! ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##

gui.frequencymodule.warning1: if I want to hear properly here. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##

gui.rocket.warning.noparachute: I don't have a parachute! If I press launch again, there's no going back! ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##

gui.spacestation.to_allow_entry: to allow another player to enter this space station! ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
gui.telemetry_fail.message: First I'll need to track an entity with that Frequency Module! (Or try wearing it!) ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
gui.telemetry_fail_no_frequency_module.m: I'll probably need a Frequency Module in my hand to make use of this! ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
gui.telemetry_fail_wearing_it.message: I'll need to take off my Frequency Module if I want to link it with this Telemetry Unit! ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
gui.tracking.message: Tracking activated. Now I'll need to right-click this on a Telemetry Unit to complete the link. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
newversion.failed: Galacticraft update check failed! Trying again in 15 seconds
block.galacticraftcore.air_lock_frame.de: Air Lock Frames, when arranged in a portal-like formation, with a single block replaced with a controller, will function as a working air lock. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.aluminum_wire.des: Aluminum Wire is used to connect energy sources to energy consuming machines. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.aluminum_wire_hea: Heavy Aluminum Wire is used to connect energy sources to energy consuming machines. Transfers at a faster rate than it's predecessor. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.arclamp.descripti: Arc Lamps are used to provide strong light to a large area, also causing most mobs to flee. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.buggy_pad.descrip: Fueling Pads will allow a buggy on the pad to be refueled by an attached Fuel Loaders if set up in a 3x3 square.  Cannot be used to launch rockets! ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.cargo_loader.desc: Cargo Loaders will pass blocks and items onto Rockets and other vehicles with cargo space. Must be attached to Landing/Fueling pad. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.cargo_unloader.de: Cargo Unloaders will extract blocks and items from Rockets and other vehicles with cargo space. Must be attached to Landing/Fueling pad. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.cheese.descriptio: Cheese Blocks are created from the cheeses of the Moon, place-able and edible. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.circuit_fabricato: Circuit Fabricator will process basic materials into silicon wafers, used for advanced machines. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.coal_generator.de: Coal Generator will simply burn coal for energy collection. The simplest but least efficient energy collection method. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.collector.descrip: Oxygen Collector will store oxygen collected from leaves in the surrounding area. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
Compressor will process ingots into their compressed equivalents. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.ingot_compressor_: Electric Compressor will process ingots into their compressed equivalents. Compresses two at a time, making it more effective than it's predecessor. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.dishbase.descript: The Communications Dish can track the position of space stations and receive communications from your remote space bases. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.distributor.descr: Oxygen Distributor will emit an oxygen bubble outwards from the center block, using internal tank. This allows safe breathing inside the bubble. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
Electric Furnace is used as a faster alternative to traditional coal furnaces. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.furnace_arc.descr: Arc Furnace is used as a faster alternative to both traditional coal and electric furnaces. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.enclosed.descript: Sealable blocks should be used where air cannot pass, such as space base walls. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.energy_storage.de: Energy Storage Module is used to store large amounts of energy for later use. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.energy_cluster.de: Energy Storage Cluster is used to store large amounts of energy for later use. Stores and outputs more energy than it's predecessor. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.fallen_meteor.des: Fallen Meteors can be found in many planets/moons which have little or no atmosphere. Will drop Meteoric Iron when broken. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.fuel_loader.descr: After being connected to a launch pad, a Fuel Loader will allow fuel to passed into the connected Rocket or other vehicle. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.glowstone_torch.d: Glowstone Torches are best used to light areas when there is no oxygen for wood torches to burn. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.landing_pad.descr: Landing Pads will allow placement of Rockets if set up in a 3x3 square. Fuel Loaders, Cargo Loaders, and Launch Controllers can be attached. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.oxygen_compressor: Oxygen Compressor will load oxygen from internal storage into an oxygen tank. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.oxygen_decompress: Oxygen Decompressor will unload oxygen into internal storage from an oxygen tank. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.oxygen_detector.d: Oxygen Detector will emit a redstone signal when surrounded by oxygen. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.oxygen_pipe.descr: Oxygen Pipe will transfer oxygen from one machine's internal gas storage to another. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.oxygen_storage_mo: Oxygen Storage Module is used to store large amounts of oxygen for later use. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.parachest.descrip: Parachests will fall from the sky after landing on certain planets/moons, such as Earth. Contains rocket, fuel, and cargo from previous launch. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.refinery.descript: Refinery will take an input of oil and energy, and output fuel used for rockets and vehicles. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
The NASA Workbench is used to create many advanced parts and vehicles. New schematics can be added as they are found. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.sealer.descriptio: Oxygen Sealer will check for an enclosed space. If one is found, the area will fill with breathable air. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.solar_advanced.de: Advanced Solar Panels will collect energy from the sun, storing it for further use. Automatically adjusts panel angle for optimal energy collection. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.solar.description: Basic Solar Panels will collect energy from the sun, storing it for further use. Collects most energy at mid-day (non-adjustable). ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.spin_thruster.des: Spin Thrusters are used to make space stations rotate. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.telemetry.descrip: This gathers useful data from linked rockets, players and mobs. Best placed near to a Display Screen. Use a Frequency Module to establish data links. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.treasure_chest.de: Tier 1 Treasure Chests will generate in Moon Dungeons. They are unlockable after defeating the final boss. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
block.galacticraftcore.view_screen.descr: Display screens add that final touch to your space base. Right-click changes the information shown. ##NEEDS TRANSLATE##
